title: 这是怎么回事
author: fzh003
txt_content:
*** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.2.2 ***
*** Invoking minecraft main() ***
???? 29, 2015 9:42:36 ???? net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LogWrapper log
????: Using tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] Forge Mod Loader version 6.2.62.871 for Minecraft 1.6.2 loading
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.7.0_67, running on Windows 7:amd64:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre7
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] The coremod atomicstryker.dynamiclights.common.DLFMLCorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] The coremod invtweaks.forge.asm.FMLPlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] The coremod micdoodle8.mods.miccore.MicdoodlePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] The coremod codechicken.nei.asm.NEICorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] The coremod mods.flammpfeil.slashblade.asm.CorePlugin does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
2015-06-29 21:42:36 [????] [ForgeModLoader] The coremod lain.mods.inputfix.InputFix does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
2015-06-29 21:42:37 [????] [STDOUT] Loaded 39 rules from AccessTransformer config file fml_at.cfg
2015-06-29 21:42:37 [????] [STDOUT] Loaded 107 rules from AccessTransformer config file forge_at.cfg
2015-06-29 21:42:37 [????] [STDOUT] Successfully Registered Transformer
Minecraft崩溃了！
可能是Mod或其他问题。
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(SourceFile:125)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: codechicken/core/launch/CodeChickenCorePlugin
        at codechicken.nei.asm.NEICorePlugin.getASMTransformerClass(NEICorePlugin.java:23)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.injectTransformers(CoreModManager.java:397)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.injectPostfixTransformers(FMLLaunchHandler.java:108)
        at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.appendCoreMods(FMLLaunchHandler.java:113)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.injectIntoClassLoader(FMLTweaker.java:80)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:51)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:18)
        ... 5 more
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: codechicken.core.launch.CodeChickenCorePlugin
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:179)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 12 more
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.objectweb.asm.ClassReader.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at invtweaks.forge.asm.ContainerTransformer.transform(ContainerTransformer.java:115)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.runTransformers(LaunchClassLoader.java:267)
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.LaunchClassLoader.findClass(LaunchClassLoader.java:165)
        ... 14 more

2015-06-29 21:42:39 [????] [STDOUT] *** Main class main() finished ***
    怎么回事

replies.author: Stagnate_小萌
replies.txt_content: 报错，你这个是程序报错了！里面出现了了插件还有mod的问题，你可以一个一个的测试并把错的插件和报错的程序一个个测试可以用的装回去！不可以使用删去！
